name: Only an Alien Going Up!
description:
You're in the shoes of the alien Frank, who wakes up on a flooded water planet. He doesn't remember why or how he got there, but he comes across strange floating objects to climb and understands that this is his only opportunity to escape from this situation.

Main features:


  • Grab edges and climb mechanic.
  • Double jump with spin.
  • Air and normal dash.
  • Diving and swimming.
  • Crouch, crawl and backflip.
  • Different dynamic platforms.
  • Timer system.
  • Day and night transitions.

And more secrets to discover by playing!



Are you ready to finish the run in your best time?
